Html: I have a question is there a way to play this game as a exe file or without the need for visual basic or the other programing software I only wish to play the game not to edit it

Hi. There s no executable released, the source is really in a pre-alpha state, sorry.

And there s no gameplay by the way, just an engine : even building something in the world would be a big waste of time, the world is not saved to disk currently.

Follow the project , there will be a demo executable release one day, cant say when. could be weeks or months. Or could be tomorrow if someone makes it on his own fork ;)
